Upcoming Meetings in AI, Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning: June 2018 and Beyond

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: AI, Analytics, Big Data, Boston, Las Vegas, London, Meetings, New York City, Singapore

Coming soon: Mega-PAW Las Vegas, Spark + AI Summit SF, CogX London, Big Data Toronto Big Data Toronto Conference and Expo, ICDM/MLDM NYC, and many more.


By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
Here are 120+ upcoming meetings and conferences, for June 2018 and beyond.

You can also find the latest list on KDnuggets Meetings page

Top countries:
  • USA: 52
  • UK: 18
  • Singapore: 7
  • Germany, Canada: 6
  • Spain: 5
  • Italy: 4
  • Sweden: 3


Top cities:
  • London: 17
  • New York: 10
  • Las Vegas: 8
  • Singapore, Boston: 7
  • San Francisco: 6
  • Toronto: 4
  • Stockholm, Madrid, Chicago: 3
Top keywords
  • AI | Artificial Intelligence, 31
  • Analytics, 27
  • Big Data, 16
  • Data Science, 14
  • Machine Learning, 13
  • Predictive Analytics, 11
  • Data Mining, 7
  • Deep Learning, 6
Color code: Business-Oriented meetings in Blue, Research meetings (with calls for papers and program committee) in green


June 2018

June: Americas
  • Jun 3-7, Predictive Analytics World, Mega-PAW. Las Vegas, NV, USA. Combining
    • Deep Learning World,
    • Predictive Analytics World Business,
    • Predictive Analytics World Financial,
    • Predictive Analytics World Healthcare
    • Predictive Analytics World Manufacturing
  • Jun 4-6, Spark + AI Summit. San Francisco, CA, USA.
  • Jun 4-7, 6th IEEE Int. Conference on Healthcare Informatics (ICHI 2018). New York, NY, USA.
  • Jun 7, H2O AI World. New York, NY, USA.
  • Jun 11-12, AI in Healthcare Summit. San Francisco, CA, USA.
  • Jun 12-13, Big Data Toronto Conference and Expo. Toronto, ON, Canada.
    Register for your free expo pass
.
  • Jun 12-13, AI Toronto will feature talks by industry leaders, developers, and experts on the future of AI. Toronto, ON, Canada.
    Register for your free expo pass
    • .
  • Jun 13, Data Science Salon. New York, NY, USA.
    Save 20% with code KDnuggets.
  • Jun 18-19, EduData Summit. Boston, MA, USA.
  • Jun 19-21, PAPIs.io LATAM, Real-World Machine Learning Stories. Sao Paulo, Brazil.
  • Jun 21-22, Artificial Intelligence Leaders Summit. Boston, MA, USA.
  • Jun 26, Boston Area SAS User Group. Boston, MA, USA.
  • Jun 27-28, Real Business Intelligence. Cambridge, MA, USA.
  • Jun 27-28, Insurance AI & Analytics USA Summit. Chicago, IL, USA.
  • Jun 28-29, AI in Industrial Automation Summit #reworkAuto,
    Deep Learning for Robotics Summit #reworkrobotics. San Francisco, CA, USA.
    Save 20% with code KDnuggets.



    • June: Asia and Australia
    • 3-6 Jun, The 22nd Pacific-Asia Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (PAKDD'18). Melbourne, Australia.
    • 6-7 Jun, Machine Intelligence Summit #reworkMI,
      AI in Healthcare Summit Asia #reworkHealth. Hong Kong.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.
    • 27-28 Jun, Analytics Leaders Summit. Manila, Philippines.



    June: Europe
    • 2-3 Jun, Call Of Data. Madrid, Spain.
    • 4-6 Jun, IEEE Data Science Workshop. Lausanne, Switzerland.
    • 5-6 Jun, Chief Data Officer Exchange. Berlin, Germany.
      Get 20% off with code KD20
    • 10-15 Jun, LION12: Learning and Intelligent OptimizatioN Conference. Kalamata, Greece.
    • 11-12 Jun, CogX London 2018: Festival of All Things AI. London, UK.
    • 11-17 Jun, London Tech Week. London, UK, including
      • 12-13 Jun, The AI Summit, part of London Tech Week. London, UK.
      • 15 Jun, Data Festival London. London, UK.
    • 12-13 Jun, Predictive Analytics World Industry 4.0. Muenchen, Germany.
    • 12-13 Jun, SwissText 2018, the 3rd Swiss Text Analytics Conference. Winterthur, Switzerland.
    • 14-15 Jun, Data & Analytics for Customer Intelligence in the Financial Industry Summit. Berlin, Germany.
    • 18-20 Jun, Machine Learning Conference. Munich, Germany.
    • 20-21 Jun, 5th Int. Conf. on Big Data Analysis and Data Mining. Rome, Italy.
    • 21 Jun, TechTown: Big Data | Analytics | BI | IoT | Data Visualisation | Blockchain. London, UK.
    • 27-28 Jun, AI Expo Europe. Amsterdam, Netherlands.
      Use KDNUGGETS20 for exclusive 20% off discount.
    • 27-28 Jun, AI, Machine Learning and Sentiment Analysis Applied to Finance. London, UK.
      Use code KDHK20 to save 20%.
    • 29 Jun, The 4th Research and Applied AI summit. London, UK.


    July 2018

    July: Americas
    • Jul 8-13, IEEE World Congress on Computational Intelligence. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
    • Jul 7-10, MDA 2018: Int. Conference on Mass Data Analysis of Signals and Images. New York, NY, USA.
    • Jul 11-15, ICDM 2018: 18th Industrial Conference on Data Mining. New York, NY, USA.
    • Jul 12-15, 4th Annual International Conference on Computational Social Science. Evanston, IL, USA.
    • Jul 14-19, MLDM 2018: 14th Int. Conference on Machine Learning and Data Mining. New York, NY, USA.
    • Jul 17-18, Big Data Innovation Summit. Las Vegas, NV, USA.
    • Jul 17-18, Business Analytics Innovation Summit. Las Vegas, NV, USA.
    • Jul 24-27, Google Cloud Next '18. San Francisco, CA, USA.
    • Jul 30 - Aug 2, 14th International Conference on Data Science (ICDATA'18). Las Vegas, NV, USA.


    July: Asia
    • 11-12 Jul, Chief Data Officer Summit. Singapore.
    • 17-18 Jul, World AI Show. Singapore.


    July: Europe
    • 10-15 Jul, ICML 2018, 35th International Conference on Machine Learning. Stockholm, Sweden.
    • 13-19 Jul, IJCAI-ECAI-18, the 27th International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence and the 23rd European Conference on Artificial Intelligence. Stockholm, Sweden.
    • 18-20 Jul, #SMSociety 9th Int. Conf. On Social Media And Society. Copenhagen, Denmark.


    August 2018

    August: Americas
    • Aug 5-10, TDWI, The leading event for analytics and big data (and one your family will beg you to attend). Disneyland, Anaheim, CA, USA.
    • Aug 11, Big Data Day LA. Los Angeles, CA, USA.
    • Aug 14-15, Data Science Leaders Network. Boston, MA, USA.
    • Aug 21-24, JupyterCon. New York, NY, USA.
    • Aug 27-31, 44th International Conference on Very Large Data Bases. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.


    August: Asia
    • 7-9 Aug, 4th IEEE International Conference on Data Science and Engineering (ICDSE). Kochi, India.
    • 20-21 Aug, Big Data Innovation, Data Mining and Analytics Summit. Singapore.
    • 27-28 Aug, India National Conference on Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Bangalore, India.
    • 28-29 Aug, Analytics Leaders Summit. Bangkok, Thailand.
    August: Europe and Middle East
    • 21-23 Aug, KDD 2018, 24th ACM SIGKDD Conference on Data Science. London, UK.
    • 28-31 Aug, ASONAM 2018: IEEE/ACM Int. Conference on Advances in Social Networks Analysis and Mining. Calgary, Canada.
    • 30-31 Aug, 5th World Machine Learning and Deep Learning Congress. Dubai, UAE.
      Use code MLDL18SAVE20 to save 20% - email to machinelearning2018@rediffmail.com with a subject line "MLDL18SAVE20"
    • 30-31 Aug, Computer Science, Machine Learning and Big Data Analytics. Dubai, UAE.


    September 2018

    September: Americas
    • Sep 4-7, Artificial Intelligence Conference. San Francisco, CA, USA.
    • Sep 5-7 WUSS, Western Users of SAS® Software Conference. Sacramento, CA, USA.
    • Sep 6-7, AI in Finance Summit #reworkFin. New York, NY, USA.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.
    • Sep 11-12, Big Data Innovation Summit. Boston, MA, USA.
    • Sep 11-12, Data Visualization Summit. Boston, MA, USA.
    • Sep 13, Data Science Salon. Los Angeles, CA, USA.
      Save 20% with code KDnuggets.
    • Sep 17-19, SAS Analytics Experience. San Diego, CA, USA.
    • Sep 18-19, Predictive Analytics World - Government. Washington, DC, USA.


    September: Asia
    • 12-13 Sep, Big Data & AI Leaders Summit. Singapore.


    September: Europe
    • 11 Sep, 8th Global Techmining Conference. Leiden, The Netherlands.
    • 18-20 Sep, KDIR: 10th International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Information Retrieval. Seville, Spain.
    • 19-20 Sep, Chief Data & Analytics Officer, Europe 2018. Frankfurt, Germany.
      Use code KD100 to save.
    • 20-21 Sep, Deep Learning Summit #reworkDL,
      Deep Learning in Healthcare Summit #reworkHealth. London, UK.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.
    • 25-27 Sep, Grid Analytics Europe 2018, Big Data Management, Analytics and Visualisation to Power the Smart Utility. London, UK.


    October 2018

    October: Americas
    • Oct 12-14, DataScienceGO, focuses on Data Science careers. San Diego, CA, USA.
    • Oct 14, SouthEast SAS Users Group. St. Pete Beach, FL, USA.
    • Oct 19, TEXATA Summit: Big Data + Data Science + Machine Learning + AI. Austin, TX, USA.
    • Oct 22-25, Tableau Conference 2018. New Orleans, LA, USA.
    • Oct 23-26, JMP Discovery Summit. Cary, NC, USA.
    • Oct 24-25, Business Intelligence Innovation Summit. Chicago, IL, USA.
    • Oct 24-25, Predictive Analytics Innovation Summit. Chicago, IL, USA.
    • Oct 25-26, Deep Learning Summit #reworkDL. Toronto, ON, Canada.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.
    • Oct 25-26, AI for Government Summit #reworkGov. Toronto, ON, Canada.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.


    October: Asia
    • 16-18 Oct, 1st International Workshop on Text Data Science. Yichang, China.


    October: Europe
    • 1 Oct, Int. Conference on Data Science, E-learning and Information Systems. Madrid, Spain.
    • 1-4 Oct, 2018 IEEE International Conference on Data Science and Advanced Analytics (DSAA'2018). Turin, Italy.
    • 3-4 Oct, MACHINA Summit.AI explores how Data Analytics, IoT & AI are causing major disruption across all industies. London, UK.
    • 5-7 Oct, ICANN 2018: The 27th International Conference on Artificial Neural Networks. Rhodes, Greece.
    • 10-11 Oct, World Summit AI. Amsterdam, Netherlands.
    • 11-12 Oct, Predictive Analytics World Business. London, UK.
    • 17-18 Oct, Nordic Data Science and Machine Learning Summit. Stockholm, Sweden.
    • 22 Oct, Workshop on Legal Data Analytics and Mining (LeDAM 2018), at ACM CIKM 2018. Turin, Italy.
    • 25-27 Oct, BigSurv 2018: Big Data meets Survey Science. Barcelona, Spain.
    • 29-31 Oct, 24th Int. Symposium on Methodologies for Intelligent Systems (ISMIS 2018). Limassol, Cyprus.
    • 31 Oct - 1 Nov, Chief Data Officer Summit. London, UK.
    • 31 Oct - 1 Nov, Big data & Analytics Innovation Summit. London, UK.

    November 2018

    November: Americas
    • Nov 6-7, Data Science Salon. Miami, FL, USA.
      Save 20% with code KDnuggets.
    • Nov 6-9, PASS Summit 2018. Seattle, WA, USA.
    • Nov 11-16, TDWI, Look into the future of big data and analytics. Orlando, FL, USA.

    • Nov 28-29, AI Expo North America. Santa Clara, CA.
      Use KDNUGGETS20 for exclusive 20% off discount.
    • Nov 29-30, Applied AI Summit #reworkAI and Dev Ops for Machine Learning Summit. Houston, TX, USA.
      Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.


    November: Asia
    • 17-18 Nov, IEEE ICBK 2018 (The 9th IEEE International Conference on Big Knowledge). Singapore.
    • 17-20 Nov, IEEE Int. Conference on Data Mining. Singapore.
    • 17-20 Nov, The Eighth IEEE ICDM Workshop on Data Mining in Networks, at IEEE Int. Conference on Data Mining
    . Singapore. November: Europe
    • 1-2 Nov, Data Visualisation Summit. London, UK.
    • 13-14 Nov, Predictive Analytics World Business. Berlin, Germany.
    • 13-14 Nov, Big Data LDN 2018. London, UK.
    • 14-16 Nov, Big Data Spain. Madrid, Spain.
    • 26-28 Nov, Robotic Process Automation & AI Week. London, UK.
    • 29-30 Nov, 2nd Annual Global Predictive Analytics Forum. Milan, Italy.


    December 2018

    December: Americas
    • Dec 3-5, AI World. Boston, MA, USA.
    • Dec 3-8, NIPS 2018. Montreal, Canada.
    • Dec 6-7, Machine Learning Innovation Summit. New York, NY, USA.
    • Dec 6-7, Chief Data Officer Summit. New York, NY, USA.
    • Dec 10-13, 2018 IEEE Int. Conf. on Big Data. Seattle, WA, USA.
    • Dec 17-20, 17th Int. Conference on Machine Learning and Applications. Orlando, FL, USA.


    December: Europe
    • 11-13 Dec, AI-2018: 38th SGAI Int. Conference on Artificial Intelligence. Cambridge, UK.


    January 2019



    January: Europe
    • 21-25 Jan, 19eme conference francophone sur l'Extraction et la Gestion des Connaissances. Metz, France.
